title: Auslan Interpreted OPL Finals & Worlds
body:
{{summoner:2}} 
Hello Summoners,
I'm trying to pull together an event that would be filming 2-3 **Auslan Interpreters** for the **OPL Finals**... which if successful, would go on to **Worlds**. But I need to know if it's worth it. Interpreters are quite expensive on an hourly rate, and although I may be able to get graduate students to do it, I'm unsure if that could even work. Maybe it could be done with a re-screening of the Finals, but I would ultimately like to do it Live on the day to capture the full excitement and awesome times these events creates.
How many of you Esport fans in Australia are out there that would benefit from this?
Or do you have friends or family that would be?

Thanks for reading!

_- Deaf Summoners Club_
